exterior.title: Landscaping and Garden Enhancement
exterior.description: Enhance the curb appeal by adding flower beds, shrubs, and a small garden. Consider adding a stone pathway and lighting to highlight the landscape.

exterior.title: Patio Installation
exterior.description: Install a patio in the backyard using durable materials like stone or concrete. This will create an outdoor living space for relaxation and entertainment.

exterior.title: Exterior Painting
exterior.description: Repaint the exterior of the house to give it a fresh and modern look. Choose colors that complement the surroundings and enhance the overall appearance.

exterior.title: Fence Staining and Repair
exterior.description: Stain and repair the existing fence to improve its appearance and longevity. This will enhance the property's privacy and aesthetic appeal.

exterior.title: Driveway Resurfacing
exterior.description: Resurface the driveway to improve its appearance and functionality. Consider using materials that are durable and visually appealing.

living area.title: Flooring Upgrade
living area.description: Replace the carpet in the living and dining areas with hardwood or high-quality laminate flooring. This will modernize the space and increase its appeal to potential buyers.

living area.title: Lighting Update
living area.description: Replace outdated light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient options. Consider adding recessed lighting to enhance the ambiance and functionality of the space.

living area.title: Fireplace Refresh
living area.description: Update the fireplace with a new mantel and surround. Consider painting or whitewashing the brick to give it a contemporary look.

living area.title: Paint Refresh
living area.description: Repaint the living and dining areas with neutral, modern colors to brighten the space and make it more appealing to a wide range of buyers.

living area.title: Window Treatment Upgrade
living area.description: Replace the existing window treatments with modern, energy-efficient options such as cellular shades or plantation shutters to enhance the aesthetic and energy efficiency of the home.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Lighting Fixtures
bedroom.description: Replace outdated ceiling fans and light fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lighting. This will enhance the room's ambiance and appeal to potential buyers.

bedroom.title: Install Hardwood Flooring
bedroom.description: Replace the carpet with hardwood flooring to increase the room's aesthetic appeal and value. Hardwood is a desirable feature for many buyers and can significantly enhance the room's look.

bedroom.title: Paint and Refresh Walls
bedroom.description: Apply a fresh coat of neutral paint to the walls to give the room a clean and updated look. This is a cost-effective way to refresh the space and make it more appealing.

bedroom.title: Add Built-in Closet Organizers
bedroom.description: Install built-in closet organizers to maximize storage space and improve functionality. This is a practical upgrade that can attract buyers looking for efficient storage solutions.

bedroom.title: Upgrade Window Treatments
bedroom.description: Replace old blinds with modern window treatments like shutters or shades. This can enhance the room's appearance and provide better light control and privacy.

kitchen.title: Cabinet Refinishing
kitchen.description: Refinish the existing cabinets to give them a modern look. This involves sanding, painting, or staining the cabinets to update their appearance without replacing them.

kitchen.title: Lighting Upgrade
kitchen.description: Replace the existing lighting fixtures with modern, energy-efficient LED lights. Consider adding under-cabinet lighting to enhance the workspace and ambiance.

kitchen.title: Backsplash Update
kitchen.description: Install a new backsplash with contemporary tiles to add visual interest and modernize the kitchen. This can be a DIY project or done by a professional.

kitchen.title: Countertop Replacement
kitchen.description: Replace the existing countertops with quartz or granite to enhance the kitchen's appeal and durability. This is a high-impact change that can significantly increase the kitchen's value.

kitchen.title: Hardware Update
kitchen.description: Replace cabinet handles and drawer pulls with modern hardware to give the kitchen a fresh look. This is a simple and cost-effective way to update the kitchen's appearance.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Finishing
unfinished basement.description: Transform the unfinished basement into a livable space by adding drywall, flooring, and lighting. This will increase the usable square footage of the home, making it more attractive to potential buyers.

unfinished basement.title: Home Office Conversion
unfinished basement.description: Convert a section of the basement into a home office. With more people working from home, this is a desirable feature that can add value to the property.

unfinished basement.title: Basement Bathroom Addition
unfinished basement.description: Add a small bathroom in the basement. This can be a significant selling point, especially for larger families or those looking to rent out the space.

unfinished basement.title: Storage Solutions
unfinished basement.description: Install built-in shelving and storage units to maximize space and organization. This is a cost-effective way to add functionality to the basement.

unfinished basement.title: Recreational Room
unfinished basement.description: Create a recreational area with a small bar, seating, and entertainment options. This can appeal to families and young buyers looking for a space to relax and entertain.
